column6: We can't tell you everything that happens in this issue simply because it will destroy the shock ending of the previous issue.  So instead, just know this:  The secret of Monster Island stands revealed, the Hulk is faced with a shocking surprise, we learn the outcome of Bruce's high school catastrophe, and fans will scream when they see the last panel.
column8: | writer:Peter David | colorist:Edgar Delgado | letterer:Randy Gentile | inker:Tom Palmer | penciller (cover):Lee Weeks
